title: "Mental health outcomes DataSchema"
output: html_document

```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(epiDisplay)

# Connecting with Opal data server
## Login to server and assign study data
#Load Opal R library
library(opal)
# Create an opal object with the login information
erasmus_opal <- opal.login()
#Login to Opal server and assign the content of the RECORD table(s) to your RStudio environment
# RECORD wave 1, part 1
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'RECORD_w1_1', 'RECORD.RECORD_w1_1', variables = list('Qm201','Qm202','Qm203','Qm204','Qm205','Qm206','Qm207','Qm208','Qm209','Qm210','Qm211','Qm212','Qm213'))
RECORD_w1_1 <- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'RECORD_w1_1')

# RECORD wave 1, part 2
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'RECORD_w1_2', 'RECORD.RECORD_w1_2', variables = list('depression','depressif')) 
RECORD_w1_2<- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'RECORD_w1_2')

# RECORD wave 2
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'RECORD_w2', 'RECORD.RECORD_W2', variables = list('Qm201','Qm202','Qm203','Qm204','Qm205','Qm206','Qm207','Qm208','Qm209','Qm210','Qm211','Qm212','Qm213')) 
RECORD_w2 <- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'RECORD_w2')
```
## Assign participant id as first column of your harmonized dataframes
```{r, echo=FALSE}
mho_RECORD_0 <- data.frame(id = RECORD_w1_1$id)
mho_RECORD_1 <- data.frame(id = RECORD_w2$id)

# When you are done with your work, logout of Opal server
opal.logout(erasmus_opal) 
```

# Depression subdomain

### **Variable label**:  Depressive symptom severity tertiles    
**Variable name**:  psy_dep_tertile_0  
**Variable description**:  Indicator of whether the participant has low, medium or high severity of depressive symptoms measured by tertiles of the scale-specific depressive symptom score.     
**Value type**:  integer   
**Variable unit**:  N/A  
**Category coding**:  

**Code** | **Category Label**  
------------- | -------------  
0 |   Low severity tertile of depressive symptoms
1 |   Medium severity tertile of depressive symptoms
2 |   High severity tertile of depressive symptoms 

**Harmonization status**: complete  
**Harmonization comment**:  The QD2A depression scores (0-13) in RECORD were grouped into study-specific tertiles defined as low (0), medium (1-2), and high (3-13). Scores were calculated for participants with data on at least 11 items (out of a possible 13). If 1 or 2 items were missing, scores on the completed items were summed and divided by the number of items completed and multiplied by 13. If participants missed 3 or more items, scores were not calculated and coded as missing. Items comprising the *Questionnaire of Self-Evaluated Depressive Symptomatology (QD2A)* scale are listed below:  
1. I have difficulty in shaking off the evil thoughts that pass through my head. (Yes/No)      
2. My memory does not seem to be as good as it used to be. (Yes/No)      
3. I have no energy. (Yes/No)    
4. I have less pleasure now in doing things that please or interest me than previously. (Yes/No)    
5. I am disappointed and disgusted with myself. (Yes/No)  
6. When I have the slightest thing to do I feel blocked or prevented. (Yes/No)    
7. At present I feel less happy than most people. (Yes/No)  
8. I have no hope for the future. (Yes/No)  
9. I must force myself to do anything at all. (Yes/No)  
10. My mind is not as clear as usual. (Yes/No)  
11. I feel sad at present. (Yes/No)  
12. I have difficulty in doing things I was accustomed to do. (Yes/No)   
13. At present my life seems empty. (Yes/No)

**R script**:  
```{r, echo=TRUE}
RECORD_w1_1$Qm201_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm201 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm201 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm202_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm202 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm202 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm203_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm203 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm203 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm204_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm204 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm204 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm205_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm205 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm205 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm206_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm206 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm206 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm207_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm207 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm207 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm208_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm208 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm208 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm209_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm209 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm209 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm210_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm210 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm210 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm211_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm211 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm211 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm212_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm212 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm212 == "N",0,NA)))
RECORD_w1_1$Qm213_i <- as.integer(ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm213 == "O",1, ifelse(RECORD_w1_1$Qm213 == "N",0,NA)))

RECORD_w1_1$nmiss <- apply(RECORD_w1_1[,15:27], MARGIN = 1, FUN = function(x) sum(is.na(x)))

RECORD_w1_1$psy_depression_score_0 <- apply(RECORD_w1_1[,15:27], MARGIN = 1, FUN = function(x) sum(x, na.rm = TRUE))

RECORD_w1_1$psy_depression_score_0[which(RECORD_w1_1$nmiss == 2)] <- (RECORD_w1_1$psy_depression_score_0[which(RECORD_w1_1$nmiss == 2)]/11)*13
RECORD_w1_1$psy_depression_score_0[which(RECORD_w1_1$nmiss == 1)] <- (RECORD_w1_1$psy_depression_score_0[which(RECORD_w1_1$nmiss == 1)]/12)*13

RECORD_w1_1$psy_depression_score_0[which(RECORD_w1_1$nmiss >= 3)] <- NA_integer_
```
